# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #72](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#72)

#### [chrismansellÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fpjen)

Given the planned length of the Stormlight Archive, is the Mistborn trilogies plan still in place at all?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. Second trilogy will probably be written after Stormlight 5.
